text: aur aisa hee hoga, tera paalanahaar tujhe chun lega tatha tujhe baaton ka arth sikhaayega aur tujhapar aur yaaqoob ke gharaane par apana puraskaar poora karega[1]. jaise isase pahale tere poorvajon ibraaheem aur ishî€¼aaq par poora kiya. vaastav mein, tera paalanahaar bada gyaanee tatha gunee hai
